## ScriptHost.eval() method

Evaluates the specified script

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
eval(script: string, options?: ScriptEvalOptions): Promise<ScriptValue>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  script | string | The script to evaluate |
|  options | [ScriptEvalOptions](./scripthost.scriptevaloptions.md) | Optional options that control script evaluation |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;ScriptValue&gt;

A promise that resolve to the result of the evaluation
